ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: the people of Pharaoh. Will they not have taqwa?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The people of Pharaoh. Will they not fear and take heed?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: the people of Pharaoh: do they have no fear?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and ask them, "Why do you not fear God?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “The nation of Firaun; will they not fear?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: The people of Fira`wn. Will they not have Taqwa"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: The people of Firon: Will they not guard (against evil)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: the people of Pharaoh; will they not be godfearing?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: The folk of Pharaoh. Will they not ward off (evil)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: the people of Pharaoh, will they not fear God?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: The people of Fir'awn; fear they Me not?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: the people of Pharaoh. Will they not be wary [of Allah]?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: The people of the Pharaoh: will they not fear Allah?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: The people of Fir'aun (Pharaoh). Will they not fear Allah and become righteous?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: the nation of Pharaoh. Will they not fear Me'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: The people of Pharaoh. Will they not fear?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: The people of Pharaoh. Will they not fear Allah?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:11] Pharaoh’s folk, to them as well as him — they wronged their souls by disbelieving in God and [wronged] the Children of Israel by enslaving them — Will they not (a-lā: the hamza indicates a negation meant as a rebuke) show fear?’, of God by being obedient to Him and affirm His Oneness?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (The folk of Pharaoh. Will they not ward off (evil)) and tell: will they not ward off the worship of other than Allah?
